MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA2 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Bowness Avenue, Statham Avenue, Kendal Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:28 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27pm on 22nd January 2021.
